language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect

annotation: ultimately of Mon-Khmer origin but reconstructs to Proto-Chamic

language: Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: Hot, warm; heat n.; feel warm (Fts)

item: hamʷaⁿdi tea marmare tutun tea marmare
annotation: (''i no kolkol i no hot tumas'')
maybe vua, r's and v's similar
